movies.title: The Godfather
movies.decription: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.decription: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.decription: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...
movies.stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.decription: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her nine-year-old son, John, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.
movies.stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.decription: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
movies.stars: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.decription: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.decription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
movies.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.decription: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
movies.stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.decription: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.
movies.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.decription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
movies.stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.decription: A young man is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.
movies.stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

movies.title: Leon: The Professional
movies.decription: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
movies.stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.decription: Lion cub and future king Simba tests his limits, supported by his family, but sometimes gets in over his head.
movies.stars: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.decription: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron fist.
movies.stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan

movies.title: Office Space
movies.decription: Three company workers who hate their jobs and decide to rebel against their greedy boss.
movies.stars: Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, David Herman

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.decription: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
movies.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

movies.title: Toy Story 2
movies.decription: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.
movies.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.decription: Woody, Buzz and the whole gang are back. As their owner Andy prepares to depart for college, his loyal toys find themselves in daycare where untamed tots with their sticky little fingers do not play nice. So, it's all for one and one for all as they join Barbie's counterpart Ken, a thespian hedgehog named Mr. Pricklepants and a pink, strawberry-scented teddy bear called Lots-o'-Huggin' Bear to plan their great escape.
movies.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles
